welcome.title: Welcome to RitmoVital!
welcome.description: Discover your natural cycles and optimize your daily life
welcome.explanation: Biorhythms are natural cycles that influence your physical energy, emotional state, and intellectual capacity.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: We need some basic data to calculate your biorhythms

birthdate.title: Birth Date
birthdate.description: The exact date is crucial for calculating your personal cycles

location.title: Origin and Location
location.description: This helps us personalize cultural recommendations

validation.complete_fields: Please complete all required fields to continue.

app.title: Vital Balance Pro - Advanced Comparison
app.description: Professional version to compare biorhythms of multiple people. Group analysis and advanced recommendations.
app.name: RhythmVital Pro
app.subtitle: Advanced Biorhythm Comparison
app.createdBy: RhythmVital Pro • Created by Victor M.F. Avilan

people.title: People Management
people.noPeopleDescription: Add people to start comparing their biorhythms
people.name: Name
people.maxPeopleDescription: You can compare up to 3 people simultaneously

details.title: Individual Details
details.description: Complete information of all cycles for each active person
details.noActivePeopleDescription: Select people in the "People" tab to see their complete details

comparison.title: Biorhythm Comparison (31 days)
comparison.description: 15 days before and 15 days after the selected date.
comparison.noPeopleToCompareDescription: Add at least 2 people in the "People" tab to start comparison
comparison.needMorePeopleDescription: Add at least one more person to make comparisons

recommendations.title: Group Recommendations
recommendations.description: Personalized suggestions based on group biorhythm comparison
recommendations.noRecommendationsDescription: Add people and select a comparison type to see personalized recommendations
